version_description:
► many bugs fixed;
► optimization;
► armor/protection;
► "Game Extras" renamed to "Cheater's Kit";
► new options in "Gameplay Settings":
- creative mode, map and clock - now for free!;
- day length;

- find abandoned vehicles, repair it and go for a drive;
- new tools;
- minor bugs fixed;
